channel.title: Pages on SASIP
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on SASIP

item.title: Code and Data
item.description: Codes Our codes will be publicly available in our github repository. Datasets Here is the list of the datasets available shared by SASIP participants. Alongside this catalog, you can also learn how to access the shared datasets and/or add new ones.

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2025 Zhao, Horvat, Gao: An optimal path threshold method for rigorously identifying extreme climate events, Environnemental Research Letters, February, 2025. Rigotti, Dansereau, Weiss: Investigating the relation between elastic and relaxation properties of dry, frictional granular media during shear deformation, ARXIV, February, 2025, preprint. Santana, Boutin, Horvat, Ã“lason, Williams, Rampal: Modeling Antarctic Sea Ice Variability Using a Brittle Rheology, Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems, April, 2025. Horvat, Tavri, Mohammednezhad: Consistent Antarctic sea ice concentration biases from passive microwave satellites resolved via ICESat-2 altimetry, April, 2025, preprint.
